single_crochet increase x 3= 9 3-4 single_crochet in each st around do not f/o the 4th toe connect the toes join the 1st and 2nd toe with a single_crochet work 3 more single_crochet on the 2nd toe work 4 single_crochet on the 3rd toe work 9 single_crochet on the 4th toe work 5 single_crochet on the 3rd toe work 5 single_crochet on the 2nd toe work 9 single_crochet on the 1st toe= 36 change to skip 9 stitches single_crochet in remaining 18 stitches= 27 8 7 single_crochet decrease x 3= 24 9 single_crochet in each st around stuff the feet as you work 10 6 single_crochet decrease x 3= 21 11 5 single_crochet decrease x 3= 18 12 single_crochet decrease x 6= 12 13 decrease x 6= 6 f/o and sew the hole closed sweet oddity art 4 body continued with color a turn your foot upside down and find the middle stitch refer to pictures on next page mark that and attach the yarn with a slip_stitch crochet around the opening of the foot= 20 single_crochet 1 4 single_crochet increase x 4= 24 2-3 single_crochet in each st around 4 11 single_crochet increase x 2= 26 5-6 single_crochet in each st around mark the 20th stitch on round 6 of the first leg with a stitch marker do not f/o the 2nd leg connect the legs you may need to work a few more single crochets on the 2nd leg to make the legs line up correctly 7 chain 4 work a single_crochet on the 1st leg to connect work 25 more single_crochet around the 1st leg work 4 single_crochet on the back of the chain 4 work 26 single_crochet on the 2nd leg work 4 single_crochet on the front of the chain= 60 8 9 single_crochet increase x 6= 66 9 10
